problem.markdown:
1. How many prismatic joints does an elliptical trammel mechanism have?
(x) 2 () 1 () 3 () None of these
2. Elliptical Trammel Mechanism is an inversion of ?
() Four Bar Linkage () None of these () Slider Crank Linkage (x) Double Slider Crank Linkage
3. How many revolute joints does an elliptical trammel mechanism have?
(x) 2 () 3 () 1 () None of these
4. Elliptical Trammel Mechanism can be used to draw a circle
(x) True () False
5. Inversions are formed by
() changing the kinematic pairs in kinematic linkage e.g. from revolute to prismatic () changing link lengths in kinematic linkage to get same motion (x) fixing different links in the kinematic linkage () none of these
problem.p: 1. How many prismatic joints does an elliptical trammel mechanism have?
2. Elliptical Trammel Mechanism is an inversion of ?
3. How many revolute joints does an elliptical trammel mechanism have?
4. Elliptical Trammel Mechanism can be used to draw a circle

choicegroup.choice: changing the kinematic pairs in kinematic linkage e.g. from revolute to prismatic
changing link lengths in kinematic linkage to get same motion
fixing different links in the kinematic linkage
